course_title: EPI Seminar: Epidemiology of Respiratory Infections
class_notes: This course meets during the second half of the semester.
course_description: Various topics by Epi faculty. Current topics include Prediction Research, Epidemiology of Respiratory Illness, and Infectious Disease Dynamics.
